title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Gesture-Enhanced Simulation-Based Learning of Mathematical Grammar Rules

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce structural patterns of mathematical grammar rules as visual gestures with over 80% accuracy
Learners can reduce grammar rule application errors by 50% through simulation tasks in mobile VR environments
Learners can present three or more grammar rule application cases reflecting peer feedback in project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
